kyc_step.title: Let's get started
kyc_step.subtitle: We are required to collect this information from you in order to issue you a credit card.

error.should_be_older: You must be at least 18 years old
error.should_be_under: You must be under 122 years old
error.cannot_be_future: Date cannot be in the future

verify_phone_step.title: Verify phone number
verify_phone_step.subtitle: Enter the 6-digit code you received via SMS

verify_email_step.title: Verify Your Email
verify_email_step.subtitle: A verification email was sent to {{email}}.
verify_email_step.text_1: Check your email for a verification link from Archie. Once you have verified your email, we'll create your Archie Credit Line.

collateralization_step.title: Create your credit line
collateralization_step.subtitle: Select the crypto asset you'd like to collateralize and your desired credit limit

address.title: Send {{required_collateral}} to:
address.info_text_1: Make sure you only send {{selected_collateral_asset}} to this address. Please select another asset above if youâ€™d like to collateralize a different currency.
address.info_text_2: We will settle receipt of your collateral after three confirmations.

terms.title: Terms & Conditions
terms.first: You may spend up to {{selected_collateral_asset}}% of your line of credit.
terms.second: Your minimum payment is due monthly. You will receive an email reminder when your payment is due.
terms.third:
You will be notified to pay down your balance or add collateral if
your loan-to-value ratio exceeds {{selected_collateral_asset}}%.

card_step.subtitle:
You have submitted {{total_value}} worth of collateral and have a {{credit_value}} credit limit. Make sure
your email is verified before continuing.

email_verification_alert.title: Please verify your email
email_verification_alert.text_1: Check your email for a verification link from Archie. If you did not receive a verification email, click

collateral_received_modal.title: We received your collateral!
collateral_received_modal.text: Your current collateral of {{collateral}} adds up to a ${{credit_value}} credit line.  Feel free to collateralize more assets. Note you can use  different cryptocurrencies as collateral! Click 'Next' when you're ready to get your Archie Card.

not_enough_collateral_modal.title: We received your collateral, but...
not_enough_collateral_modal.text: Your current collateral of {{collateral}} adds up to a ${{credit_value}} credit line. The minimum required value is ${{min_value}}. Please deposit at least {{difference}} worth of cryptocurrency more.

not_enough_collateral_popup.text: Your current collateral of {{collateral}} adds up to a ${{credit_value}} credit line. The minimum required value is ${{min_value}}. Please deposit at least {{difference}} worth of cryptocurrency more.

collateral_credit_line_popup.text: You are collaterizing {{collateral}} for a credit line of ${{credit_value}}.

setup_2fa_banner.title: Protect your funds with 2FA
setup_2fa_banner.text: Setup Multi-Factor Authentication using your authenticator app.

margin_call_alert.title: You have reached margin call
margin_call_alert.text: The value of your ArchCredit collateral has dropped and you have reached an LTV rate above 75%. Action is required to prevent liquidiating a portion of your collateral. We recommend sending more collateral to your ArchCredit; paying down your balance through your bank may take up to 3 days. Archie will automatically undergo a partial lidquidation if your LTV reaches 90%

dashboard_withdraw.title: Withdraw {{currentAsset}}
dashboard_withdraw.subtitle: You currently have {{assetAmount}} {{asset}} (~${{assetValue}}).
dashboard_withdraw.address_title: What address would you like to send your {{currentAsset}} to?

form.amount_label: How much {{currentAsset}} would you like to withdraw? Max is {{maxAmount}}
form.credit_change: Withdrawing this amount will reduce your Archie Collateral from ${{initialCollateralValue}} to ${{updatedCollateralValue}}. This reduces your credit limit from ${{initialCreditValue}} to ${{updatedCreditValue}}

successfull_withdrawal_modal.title: Withdrawal Successfully Initiated
successfull_withdrawal_modal.subtitle: We have initiated your withdrawal request. Follow along on the

enter_2fa_code_modal.title: Enter Your 2-Factor Authentication Code
enter_2fa_code_modal.subtitle: To complete this action, please verify your 2-Factor Authentication Code from your 2FA application
